description: portrait of Hubert van Eyck sitting at table, facing left, wearing fur hat and fur trimmed cloak
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: [Objit Gandam an ibden in cathedrali aede sepultus/ I/ HUBERTO AB EYCK, JOANNIS/ FRATRI; PICTORI/(eight lines in latin):Quas modo communes ....issurit ille manu/ +Michael Coxennius/ Michlinien insignis/  hac aetate pictor/ obit an 1575]; in pencil on sheet: [1-385]
portfolio: From from:Pictorum Aliquot Celebrum Germaniae Effigies Illustrum Quos Belgium Habuit Pictorum Effigies Antwerpae (1600), plate 1
title: Portrait of Huberto Ab Eyck, Joannis Fratri; Pictori,
